m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- October 28th, 2013 by Zachary Shahan   As some of you may remember, I posted a poll last month asking what you all thought was the most disruptive cleantech model . (Note: I used model very loosely here, and you could basically just change that out for “thing” or “solution” if you wanted to.) Interestingly, my answer (which I stand by very firmly) didn’t come out on top.
